analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x6ac544849414fbafdc0adba7c77bbd73a7d36ac1.sol:
	Contract KBCC has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x6ac544849414fbafdc0adba7c77bbd73a7d36ac1.sol#93-94)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

KBCC.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x6ac544849414fbafdc0adba7c77bbd73a7d36ac1.sol#86)
KBCC.name should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x6ac544849414fbafdc0adba7c77bbd73a7d36ac1.sol#85-86)
KBCC.symbol should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x6ac544849414fbafdc0adba7c77bbd73a7d36ac1.sol#86)
